item.title: playerGfx method. #2
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Hate to keep posting. But i don’t understand this. Some servers use this method.

public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100update = true;
updateRequired = true;
}

That makes the gfx stay with the player correct?..

Now, the problem im getting is. When i call the method, using…

playerGfx(252, 0);

In my DDSspec method, it does the emote n stuff. But doesn’t show the GFX… Same with everything…

Now if that has to be called a different way, because im not sure what Zoltanmann said… Can someone explain?..

Cause i’ve looked through EVERY file, in the source it works on. And i can’t find it. I just see playerGfx method. Called, using playerGfx(252, 0);…

I’ve tested on many sources now, and ALL of them work. Par this one im using now.

Can anyone help me? Or hit me with some tips, that might get it to work?.. If it wont work. Im looking for a method, that will do facing GFX. Like, barrage, DDS spec, specs the way your facing. Not to a set compass point.

EDIT: I tried to make one of my own, didn’t work…

Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2007, 10:48:54 AM[/size][hr]C’mon, i can’t believe, 6th page, 13 views, 0 replies…

Read full topic
